Text: do u release your torrents on any private tracker like IPT? Isuggest you to upload on ipt. please name some private trackers where u do release before public tracker
I wonder why the blueray took so long to release?  The dvdrip came out a couple weeks ago.  Oh well.  Thanks for the release Bozx.
can we get - 1280 x 720?? or please suggest any encoder.
@EXR  The movie directors choose which aspect ratio/resolution the movie is filmed in.  Not the encoders.
@Efreak15 : Thanks Man,I didn't know that.do u know any good encoder program using which I can make it into 1280x720 without loosing quality?
@EXR You can't make a 2:35:1 aspect ratio film into a 16:9 ratio film.  You can however fill the screen by using the crop function of your media player.  You just won't see the entire view.

Video quality is better than DVDRip, but not as good as a true Bluray rip.
Anyway, thanks for sharing.
@EXR try using VLC player, and in the Video setting you can change Aspect Ratio to 16:9, 16:10, 3:4, 4:3 and a bunch others.
